meanings.definition: Of or relating to a form of writing in which the lines run alternately from left to right and right to left.
meanings.sent1: The boustrophedonic script confused the students with its backward-forward pattern.
meanings.sent2: The ancient scroll displayed boustrophedonic writing, making it challenging to decipher.
meanings.sent3: The boustrophedonic notes on the paper seemed to dance across the page.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts moved boustrophedonically, shifting between opposing viewpoints.
meanings.sent5: The boustrophedonic style added a unique flair to the document, catching everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Moving or turning like an ox when plowing.
meanings.sent1: The boustrophedonic path of the tractor resembled the slow, deliberate movements of an ox.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's boustrophedonic steps mimicked the graceful swaying of a plowing ox.
meanings.sent3: The boustrophedonic motion of the toy robot amused the children, who giggled at its clumsy turns.
meanings.sent4: His boustrophedonic journey through life led him down unexpected paths, just like a plowing ox.
meanings.sent5: The boustrophedonic pattern of the clouds in the sky mirrored the ox's methodical plowing in the fields.
